resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81703</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81703</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4795</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Writing -- Consolidating the Week's Work</string>
            <string language="es">Escritura – Consolidación del trabajo de la semana</string>
            <string language="ga">Scríbhneoireacht – Obair na Seachtaine a Dhaingniú</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben -- Vereinigen der Arbeit der Woche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inscription -- consolidation du travail de la 
semaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrita -- consolidando o trabalho da semana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scrittura -- consolidare il lavoro della 
settimana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψιμο -- που παγιώνει την εργασία της εβδομάδας</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan involving children reviewing what they have learned about writing and encouraging them to create a list of things that good writers do.</string>
            <string language="es">Plan de lección que trata sobre cómo los niños revisan lo que han aprendido sobre escritura y les anima a crear una lista de cosas que hacen los buenos escritores.</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean ceachta ina ndéanann na leanaí athbhreithniú ar an méid atá foghlama acu faoin scríbhneoireacht agus a spreagann iad chun liota rudaí a dhéanann scríbhneoirí maithe a scríobh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan, der das Kindwiederholen mit 
einbezieht, was sie über Schreiben und die Anregung sie, eine Liste 
der Sachen zu erstellen erlernt haben, die gute Verfasser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon comportant passer en revue 
d'enfants ce qu'ils se sont renseignés sur l'écriture et les 
encourager à créer une liste de choses que les bons auteurs .</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição que envolve rever das crianças
o que aprenderam sobre a escrita e o incentivar criar uma lista das 
coisas que os escritores bons .</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione che coinvolge riesaminazione
dei bambini che cosa hanno imparato circa scrittura e consigliare loro
creare una lista delle cose che i buoni produttori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος που περιλαμβάνει τα παιδιά που 
αναθεωρούν τι έχουν μάθει για το γράψιμο και την ενθάρρυνση τους 
για να δημιουργήσουν έναν κατάλογο πραγμάτων τόσο οι καλοί 
συγγραφείς.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
